name: Haven (itch) (Grundyy)
description: Haven is a an RPG developed on RPG Maker VX Ace for a Narrative Course. The game follows a character who has recently lost his memory and his journey through a world devastated by nuclear war to the only known safe city for miles, Haven. Haven is set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland with many unique characters, the game also features a karma system that will affect which of the 6 endings you receive.
